mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refresh_tokens (user_id, token, expires_at, created_at, device_info, device_type, ip_address, last_used_at) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{token}, #{expires_at}, #{created_at}, #{deviceInfo}, #{deviceType}, #{ipAddress}, #{lastUsedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT refresh_token_id, user_id, token, expires_at, created_at, device_info, device_type, ip_address, last_used_at FROM refresh_tokens WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY last_used_at DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM refresh_tokens WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND token != #{exceptToken}
